Pre-Game Insights: The jersey will be worn on 15 October 2024, during the World Cup Qualifier against Chile, paying tribute to the first kit worn by the national team in 1945.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The jersey will be worn on 15 October 2024, during the World Cup Qualifier against Chile.
Others: The Chalk White shirt symbolises Colombia's humble beginnings and the legacy of those who have represented the nation.
